entry.source: {F804,5}Fafnir,{F804,0} the legendary dragon... I would like{F801}to hold a competition to see who can slay{F801}these demons the best. Apparently a flock{F801}of them live in the Overlord's castle. The{F801}first to bring me {F878,1} {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0}s shall be{F801}the winner. Your skills make me proud!{F801}
